items.q: Is this accepted in my state?
a: Yes where specified on the course page. Each state has different rules; we list approvals and any special instructions in the course details.
If you’re unsure, choose your state in the finder to see only eligible courses.
Most courses are 4–6 hours. The exact duration is shown on the course page near the top.
You can take it at your own pace—start/stop anytime and your progress is saved.

items.q: How do I get my certificate?
a: Certificates are issued immediately upon completion. You can download your digital certificate right away.
Some states also support electronic reporting to the DMV/court; when available, we’ll note it on the course page.

items.q: Will this dismiss my ticket or remove points?
a: If the course is taken for ticket dismissal or point reduction, follow the instructions on the course page.
Some courts require you to notify them after completion. We’ll tell you when that applies.
Absolutely. The course works on phone, tablet, or desktop.
Your progress is auto-saved so you can switch devices anytime.
Language options vary by course and state. Use the Language filter on the results page to see what’s available.
If you haven’t completed the course and need a refund, contact Support. Refund eligibility may vary by provider/state requirements.
Visit the Help Center for 24/7 email support and business-hours phone support.
We aim to reply within 24 hours.
